title: New: MIO – All About It
body:
Love the quirkiness to this track from Finland’s **MIO**, calling in London’s Andrew McDonnell on additional production duties.

It almost ends up feeling like a refreshing take on the tropical-pop obsession that had people hooked a couple of years back in the wake of Bieber’s Sorry, yet keeping a killer chorus at the core of it. Described as a ‘song for the over-thinkers’, _All About It_ is just downright brilliantly addictive. Check it out below.
